name: Blue Cheese Cheesecake
author: JJOHN32
summary: Serve this baked crustless cake - a mixture of blue cheese, cream cheese, and sour cream - as an impressive appetizer.
ingredients: 1  red bell pepper, halved and deseeded
directions: Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C)
Beat cream cheese and blue cheese in large mixing bowl until light and fluffy--about 5 minutes
Mix in 1 cup sour cream and pepper
Add eggs - one at a time - mixing well after each addition
Pour mixture into buttered 9 inch springform pan
Bake 60 - 65 minutes or until wooden pick inserted near center comes out clean
Remove from oven and let stand 5 minutes
Carefully spread 1 1/4 cup sour cream over top
To serve, place on serving plate
Decorate top with red pepper cut into flower shapes with small cookie cutter and green onion tops as stems
